description: This scholarship, established by alumnus, Ben Odom, is to be awarded to a Sociology undergraduate major who has shown resilience in their life and has demonstrated community involvement through volunteer efforts. Eligibility Requirements Declared Sociology, Human Services, or Substance Abuse Studies major Full-time undergraduate Minimum 2.5 GPA Financial need will be considered Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
